description:
Tired of searching for the right item in an inventory full of various mods? There's a solution for you.
Just look at the required block and enter the [b]/get[/b] command into the chat and it will instantly appear in your active hotbar slot.

[h1] Why not the middle mouse button? Scrap Mechanic API doesn't support keybindings for mods, but if they add support for them in the future, I'll definitely implement it. [/h1]

[code] [h1] [b]FAQ[/b] [/h1]
[olist]
    [*]This mod adds the function of obtaining the required block without opening the inventory (like the middle mouse button in Minecraft).
    [*]Additional hotbar pages can be selected by entering their number in the command: [b]/get 1/2/3[/b]. (1-st page by default)
[/olist] [/code]

[code] [h1] [b]Skill Issues[/b] [/h1]
[olist]
    [*]This mod doesn't work in vanilla Survival Mode, but works with other Custom Games.
[/olist] [/code]

Please consider leaving a like and adding the mod to your favorites to support my work!
name: Middle Mouse Feature from Minecraft
